articles.author: Jewel Bright
articles.title: What's on the table for the 5 African Presidents meeting Trump at the White House? - NPR
articles.description: President Trump is hosting 5 African leaders in Washington this week — a mini summit that's raising eyebrows over who was invited, what's on the table, and what it signals about U.S. rivalry with China and BRICS in Africa.
articles.content: LAGOS, Nigeria The presidents of Senegal, Liberia, Guinea-Bissau, Mauritania, and Gabon are in Washington this week for a three-day mini summit hosted by President Trump part of what the White House … [+3495 chars]
